scripts.install:deps: npm i && npm install --prefix ./apps/cart && npm install --prefix ./apps/hero && npm install --prefix ./apps/host && npm install --prefix ./apps/menu && npm install --prefix ./apps/product && npm install --prefix ./apps/reviews
scripts.cloudflare:deploy:cart: cd ./apps/cart && npm run build && CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=XXX npx wrangler pages publish dist --project-name=qwik-dream-cart
scripts.cloudflare:deploy:hero: cd ./apps/hero && npm run build && CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=XXX npx wrangler pages publish dist --project-name=qwik-dream-hero
scripts.cloudflare:deploy:host: cd ./apps/host && npm run build && CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=XXX npx wrangler pages publish dist --project-name=qwik-dream-demo
scripts.cloudflare:deploy:menu: cd ./apps/menu && npm run build && CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=XXX npx wrangler pages publish dist --project-name=qwik-dream-menu
scripts.cloudflare:deploy:product: cd ./apps/product && npm run build && CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=XXX npx wrangler pages publish dist --project-name=qwik-dream-product
scripts.cloudflare:deploy:reviews: cd ./apps/reviews && npm run build && CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=XXX npx wrangler pages publish dist --project-name=qwik-dream-reviews
